page.title: 12A Day in my life
page.content: On Saturday I wake up at about 7 a.m. but stay in bed until 9 a.m. and listen to the radio. When I've got up I have my breakfast in front of the television. Sometimes I invite Alex down and we play Star wars outside but if it's raining we play on the computer. The rest of the time I draw pictures from Star wars and listen to the radio. On the radio I listen to Adrian John on Radio 1. At 1 o'clock I have Lunch. I eat bread and cheese and drink squash or milk. After Lunch I go up stairs and play Star wars with my figures. The part I like playing most is when the Imperials attack the Planet Hoth. At 5 o'clock I go down and watch the television. I watch Keith Harris and see what film there is on. After a meal I go to bed at 9.30.
